faceErrorMes: - This ID Document don't  contains  face, please use  valid  ID document
mrzErrorMes: - Wrong ID document Type,  Please select right issuing country
inputImgErrorMes: - Bad ID document(no mrz or invalid ID document)

Home.title: VERIFY YOUR IDENTITY
Home.clockDes: it will take less more than 60 seconds
Home.titleDes: NEAKEL BANK company would like to verify your identity with
Home.titleDes1: Before starting the verification processing, make sure you are in well-lit place.
Home.titleDes2: The verification process consists of the follows steps:
Home.checkDes2: Capture of your Goverment ID document (Passport, Identity Card and Resident Permit)
Home.checkDes3: Capture of proof of address Document (Electricity Bill, Gas Bill, Internet Bill, Telephone Bill, Tax Notice)
Home.policyDes3: button below, you agree to BIOMIID

PhotoLivness.title: Selfie Capture
PhotoLivness.message: Please place your face correctly inside the oval frame and press on take a selfie

documentCountry.title: ID Document Country
documentCountry.message: Please select the Goverment ID Document issuing country

livenessResult.title: Face Liveness Result
livenessResult.glareErrorMes: - May be glares, blurries, shadows or reflections are detected
livenessResult.faceErrorMes: - Face is not correctly placed inside of oval frame.

idMain.title: ID Document Type
idMain.message: Please select your ID Document type

idDocumentCamera.frontIDMes: Place the front of National ID Card inside the frame and take a picture button
idDocumentCamera.backIDMes: Place the back page of National ID Card inside the frame and take a picture button
idDocumentCamera.passportMes: Place the Passport inside the frame and take a picture button
idDocumentCamera.frontResidentMes: Place the front of Residence Permit Card inside the frame and take a picture button
idDocumentCamera.backResidentMes: Place the back of Residence Permit Card inside the frame and take a picture button
idDocumentCamera.previewMes: Make sure all data on your document is clear and readable

poaDoc.title: POA Document
poaDoc.message: Please select the type of document and enter the proof of address document issuing date.

poaDocumentCamera.title: Scan PoA Document
poaDocumentCamera.message: Place the  Proof of address  document  inside of frame  and capture  the document
poaDocumentCamera.previewMessage: Make sure all data on your document is clear and readable

idDocResult.title: Result
idDocResult.message: Your identity verification process is completed, you will be notified about the decision soon
